column5: One member in our group has an event he has to attend this year so he cant go with us ,but if there is anyone from Iowa getting a late start and not leaving until sat may15th evening and headed towards vermillion bay -kenora -dryden and want some extra gas cash for a ride , he would be super excited for he is a great guy to be around fishing, we are fishing north west part of lac seul so we can drive a couple hours to pick him up. Let me know if theres anyone out there that picks up hitch hikers ( haha )
